text: 24.49: Ais 44.3; Jol 2.28; Zo 14.16; 14.26; 15.26; 16.7; FG 1.4Ana maaŋ mbe nzua vov, khaŋ mbe nzuai “Nde mbarara! Fhe fhum won Ŋina Ŋaara sararim, ana nde han zirɨ za suaŋgi. Gu ana sararim, ana nde han zirɨrga tuk han mbarigi. Nde wari tɨgɨp kha ŋgu bakɨmera kɨv, Fhe Bakɨme ŋkasŋka ndigiri.”
